title: Tuzigoot National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Hours Open daily from 8 AM to 4 PM; to get enough time to see the entire site, please be in the monument by 3 PM.  The park is closed on Christmas Day.  Phone 928-634-5564  Exhibits Our museum was renovated and reopened in June of 2011.  Exhibits depict the life style of the Sinaguan Indians, and include interactive computer programs in addition to artifacts.  Available Facilities Western National Parks Association (WNPA) Book Store and restrooms.
